characteristics.name: Trolling Style
characteristics.description: Consistently appears in their content as a lighthearted way to engage with others.

options.description: Characterizes the user's approach, making interactions more relaxed and humorous.
Highlights the user's tendency to use humor to critique or mock others.

characteristics.name: Risk Tolerance
characteristics.description: Their behavior in discussing risks and investments suggests a certain level of comfort with uncertainty.

options.description: Indicates the user's willingness to take bold action when assessing potential rewards.
Reflects the user's caution and careful approach when evaluating risks.

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Their casting style often involves using a conversational tone, making complex topics more accessible.

options.description: Characterizes the user's straightforward and to-the-point approach.
Highlights the user's tendency to provide thoughtful and detailed explanations.

characteristics.name: Investment Focus
characteristics.description: Their discussions around investing consistently emphasize long-term growth and diversification.

options.description: Reflects the user's prioritization of preserving capital over potential short-term gains.
Indicates the user's focus on maximizing returns through high-risk investments.

characteristics.name: Network Size
characteristics.description: Their social media presence showcases a diverse network of connections, suggesting an interest in community building.

options.description: Characterizes the user's preference for close, intimate relationships over large networks.
Highlights the user's desire to engage with many people and foster a sense of belonging.

characteristics.name: Risk Perception
characteristics.description: Their casting style often downplays risks, implying that they view uncertainty as manageable.

options.description: Reflects the user's tendency to be overly cautious when evaluating potential risks.
Highlights the user's confidence in their ability to navigate uncertain situations.

characteristics.name: Problem-Solving Approach
characteristics.description: Their responses often involve finding creative solutions to complex problems.

options.description: Characterizes the user's approach as logical and methodical.
Highlights the user's reliance on instinct and gut feelings when solving problems.

characteristics.name: Emotional Expression
characteristics.description: Their content rarely expresses strong emotions, suggesting a stoic or reserved personality.

options.description: Characterizes the user's tendency to openly discuss their feelings and emotions.
Highlights the user's reluctance to share personal emotions or vulnerabilities.
